activities:
Clinical Reference Laboratory, Inc. (CRL) is a privately held clinical testing laboratory offering leading edge services in the areas of Global Clinical Trials, Wellness, Molecular Diagnostics, Insurance Risk Assessment, and Drugs of Abuse Testing.  

We may receive personal information with the collected specimens or determine personal information during the processing of the specimen in our labs.  This could include name, date of birth, identification numbers, health information, or other information connected to the provision of services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Drugs & Pharmaceuticals - (DRG)Health Care Services - (HCS)Laboratory Scientific Instruments - (LAB)
personaldata: CRL may receive, process, use, store, and disclose personal information during the provision of laboratory services to CRL's clients.
